Plot: What seemed like a breezy idea for an engineer to net him millions of dollars, leaves him on the run for his life and piecing together why he's being chased.
Title: Paycheck
Writer: Philip K. Dick (short story), Dean Georgaris (screenplay)
Actors: Ben Affleck, Aaron Eckhart, Uma Thurman, Paul Giamatti
tomatoConsensus: Though Dick's short story has an intriguing premise, Woo reduces it to a lot of meaningless chases, shoot-outs, and explosions.
